data.title: Entergy Louisiana
data.text:
Entergy Louisiana, LLC serves approximately 1.1 million electric customers in 58 parishes. Entergy Louisiana also provides natural gas service to approximately 96,000 customers in Baton Rouge.*

Entergy companies employ about 4,500 people in Louisiana, and approximately 2,200 Entergy retirees also reside there.

Louisiana parishes served by Entergy

Acadia Allen Ascension Assumption Avoyelles Beauregard Bienville Bossier Calcasieu Cameron Catahoula Claiborne Caldwell Concordia East Baton Rouge East Carroll East Feliciana Franklin Grant Iberia Iberville Jackson Jefferson Jefferson Davis Lafayette Lafourche LaSalle Lincoln Livingston Madison Morehouse Natchitoches Ouachita Plaquemines Pointe Coupee Red River Richland Sabine St. Bernard St. Charles St. Helena St. James St. John the Baptist St. Landry St. Martin St. Tammany

(only a portion

of Madisonville) Tangipahoa Tensas Terrebonne Union Vermilion Vernon Washington Webster West Baton Rouge West Carroll West Feliciana Winn

* As of Dec. 31, 2023.
